casebody.data:
The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Allan B. Stevens, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 70-120;Third DistrictSeptember 28, 1971.

PER CURIAM.

Bruce Stratton, of Defender Project, of Ottawa, for appellant.James N. DeWulf, State’s Attorney, of Rock Island, for the People.
